config.title: Header Style 38

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 16px/1.35 Jost, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 500 16px/1.35 Jost, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 16px/1.35 Jost, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-38" /> <referenceContainer name="header-container-inner"> <container name="header-ads-top" before="-"> <block name="header-extra-text-1" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_1</argument> </action> </block> </container> <container name="header-top" htmlId="header-top" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-top container" /> <container name="header-bottom" htmlId="header-bottom" after="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-bottom" /> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-row row" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-9 header-panel-left hidden-xs" /> <container name="header-panel-middle" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 header-panel-middle text-center" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-9 header-panel-right"> </container> <container name="header-panel-search" htmlTag="div" htmlId="header-search-wrap" htmlClass="col-sm-24 header-search-wrap" /> </container> </referenceContainer> <move element="header.panel" destination="header-top" />
<move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-panel-right" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-panel-search" after="-"/> <move element="minicart" destination="header-panel-right" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-middle" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-panel-right" before="-" />
<referenceContainer name="header-panel-left"> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="footer-switch-language" template="Magento_Store::switch/languages-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Directory\Block\Currency" name="footer-switch-currency" template="Magento_Directory::currency-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Framework\View\Element\Template" name="links.features.search" template="Magento_Search::search-trigger.phtml"> <arguments> <argument name="html_class" xsi:type="string">search-link</argument> </arguments> </block> <block name="header-extra-text-2" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_2</argument> </action> </block> </referenceContainer> <referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-bottom" before="-" />
<move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> </body>
config.content:
{"content_1":"
Orders over $49 get free shipping. Buy 2 Get 1 Free.
","content_2":""}
